taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Outline view, select the attribute on which you want to display the Weighted Mean. The underlying business type of this attribute must be a Number or an Amount.
Drag and drop this attribute in the table.
Select the table in the editor.
In the Properties view pane, click the Transformation tab.
In the Aggregate tab, click the Add button to open the Aggregate Definition dialog.
Define the dataset attribute for the Weighted Mean's Weight . The underlying business type of this attribute must be Number or Amount.
